name: Learn Numbers English Arabic
description: An interactive educational program that aims to teach the children figures in a fun and entertaining manner in the form of games and challenges that stimulate the child to learn. The program contains the following:  1- Teaching Arabic numerals 2 - Teaching English numbers 3- Teaching numbers in contests 4- Teaching numbers in a moving way 5 - Suitable design of the child icons figures in order to recognize the child and distinguish them.   We hope you will leave us your comments and comments about the application and do not forget to evaluate the application by clicking the stars below the application.
